snippet: Shares in a Hong Kong media group began to rally before the announcement that Alibaba, the Chinese e-commerce giant, had reached an $804 million deal to buy control of the company.
abstract: Shares in a Hong Kong media group began to rally before the announcement that Alibaba, the Chinese e-commerce giant, had reached an $804 million deal to buy control of the company.

headline.main: Shares in a Media Group Soar Well Before Alibaba Makes a Deal
headline.print_headline: Shares in a Hong Kong Media Group Soar Well Before Alibaba Makes a Deal
